details:
Two issues have been found in cups, the Common UNIX Printing System(tm).


Basically both CVEs ([CVE-2019-8675](https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/CVE-2019-8675) and [CVE-2019-8696](https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/CVE-2019-8696)) are about
stack-buffer-overflow in two functions of libcup. One happens in
asn1\_get\_type() the other one in asn1\_get\_packed().


For Debian 8 Jessie, these problems have been fixed in version
1.7.5-11+deb8u5.


We recommend that you upgrade your cups packages.


Further information about Debian LTS security advisories, how to apply
these updates to your system and frequently asked questions can be
found at: <https://wiki.debian.org/LTS>
